product_name: Brooks Silver Bullet Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The windproof and water-resistant men's Brooks Silver Bullet jacket uses an aluminum membrane to reflect body heat so you can be warm without adding extra layers in nasty, wet weather. Aluminum membrane creates more warmth with minimal weight. Venting at back arm holes; moisture-proof media pocket works with your tunes. Cozy cuffs with thumbholes and flip mitts keep hands warm. The semifitted men's Brooks Silver Bullet jacket is not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
short_description: The windproof and water-resistant men's Brooks Silver Bullet jacket uses an aluminum membrane to reflect body heat so you can be warm without adding extra layers in nasty, wet weather.
